subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Nuggets scored the game’s first 21 fast-break points en route to their 18th straight victory at the Pepsi Center, where Denver is 33-3, the best home record in the league.
snippet: The Nuggets scored the game’s first 21 fast-break points en route to their 18th straight victory at the Pepsi Center, where Denver is 33-3, the best home record in the league.
